law.catch_line: Financial condition, market conduct, and business practices subject to examination.
law.text: Health maintenance organizations shall be subject to the provisions of KRS 304.2-210, 304.2-220, 304.2-230, 304.2-240, 304.2-250, 304.2-260, 304.2-270, 304.2-280, 304.2-290, 304.2-300, and Subtitle 2 of this chapter for determining financial condition, market conduct, and business practices.
law.history: Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 42, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 320, sec. 40, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 357, subtit. 38, sec. 12, effective June 21, 1974.
